result.title: Opera Speed Dial
result.content:
For Opera users. Who wants speed dial like this:


The file speeddial.ini have something like this

[Size]

Rows=4

Columns=9

Just change the numbers and restart Opera. By the way when editing speeddial.ini recommended to close Opera.

How to find the file speeddial.ini - on top of the program are looking Menu -> Help -> About, there will be to find the path to the profile folder (eg C: \ Documents and Settings \ BENDER \ Application Data \ Opera \ Opera \ profile). Just edit speeddial.ini with notepad

PS: the first five comments do not read. This is an old post. I changed it.
